model.hand.representation

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.hand.representation.Hand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OmahaHand, PineappleHand, TexasHoldEmHand

    public abstract class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class implements HandInterface, the class describes a generic poker hand, one full turn in a poker game.

    The class deals the communityCards cards and allows for the players to make bets. The hand object runs through a full poker hand, and decides its winner.
